text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1902 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ; January * 17 – Elias Blix (65), organist and composer. ; August * 19 – Lars Fykerud (42), Hardanger fiddler and composer. ==Births== ; May * 7 – Jolly Kramer-Johansen, composer (died 1968). ; October * 30 – Bias Bernhoft, singer and revue writer (died 1986). ; November * 21 – Harald Lie, solo cellist for the Oslo Philharmonic (died 1942). ==See also== * 1902 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1900s in Norwegian music
title: 1902 in Norwegian music
